thread.title: Brad
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Brad

author: Brad
title: Brad
text: The representative at the counter made true on his promise to rotate my tires on time, so I could make my previously scheduled appointments. although I had to leave the store for a while, he made sure to text me twice. Once to let me know that my car had just been taken in, and another to let me know it was ready for pick up. I still had an extra 1,1/2 Hours left to get to my Appointments. Great Job, Town Fair!
